similar.title: Coronavirus Pandemic and Worries during Pregnancy; a Letter to Editor.
text: Coronavirus Pandemic and Worries during Pregnancy; a Letter to Editor.

similar.title: Perinatal Transmission of COVID-19 Associated SARS-CoV-2: Should We Worry?
text: Perinatal Transmission of COVID-19 Associated SARS-CoV-2: Should We Worry?

We presented two cases of COVID-19 associated SARS-CoV-2 infection during third trimester of pregnancy. Both mothers and newborns had excellent outcomes. We failed to identify SARS-CoV-2 in all the products of conception and the newborns. This report provided evidence of low risk of intrauterine infection by vertical transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
abstract: We presented two cases of COVID-19 associated SARS-CoV-2 infection during third trimester of pregnancy. Both mothers and newborns had excellent outcomes. We failed to identify SARS-CoV-2 in all the products of conception and the newborns. This report provided evidence of low risk of intrauterine infection by vertical transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
